frameDefinitions: A Text is an entity that contains linguistic, symbolic information on a Topic, created by an Author at the Time_of_creation.
This frame contains nouns denoting a rank or level within an established hierarchy.
An Astronomical_entity comes into view above the horizon as part of a regular, periodic process of (apparent) motion of the Astronomical_entity across the sky.
An Agent moves Goods (or some other useful item) from an Exporting_area, across a boundary or border to a different area, the Importing_area.
This frame is  concerned with the percepts that vibrations which travel through the air or another medium produce in hearing organs.
This frame is concerned with the sounds produced by animate entities by means of their vocal tracts.
frameExamples: Venus <t>rose</t> at 5:23 AM, twenty minutes before the sun which reached the horizon at 5:43 AM.
Cooperating was an old term used by the Customs service to describe the illegal traffic of contrabandsold and <t>transhipped</t> from larger vessels into small local boats.
I awoke to the <t>clash</t> of a jackhammer on concrete.
He woke up because of the <t>cries</t> of the crows outside.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Text</fen> is the entity that contains linguistic information. This an incorporated role for each LU in this frame.
The region where the <fen>Text</fen> is sold, circulated, or otherwise popular.
The Rank itself, usually denoted by the noun.
An entity which holds a particular <fen>Rank</fen>.
An entity which is periodically visible from the earth's surface.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Astronomical_entity</fen> appears.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> from which the motion of the <fen>Astronomical_entity</fen> is viewed.
The conscious entity, generally a person, that moves the <fen>Goods</fen>.
The items of value whose location is changing.
The role <fen>Importing_area</fen> is the place that the <fen>Goods</fen> end up as a result of motion.
The place where the <fen>Goods</fen> are initially, before the action.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> moves the <fen>Goods</fen>.
An entity that is construed as a single point source emitting sound.

The location at which sound is produced. This role differs from Location_of_sound_source in that it does not highlight the sound's spreading from its source to the perceiver's location, which is usually indicated by the preposition 'from'.
An entity that is construed as a single point source emitting sound.

The location at which sound is produced. This role differs from <fen>Location_of_sound_source</fen> in that it does not highlight the sound's spreading from its source to the perceiver's location, which is usually indicated by the preposition 'from'.
listRoleExamples: Heku left one morning as <fex>the sun</fex> rose along the plain.
As the sun came up <fex>at 5:15 am</fex>, it made the red rocks almost glow.
The very end of the eclipse will be visible as the sun rises <fex>in some locations in Africa and northeastern North America</fex>.
He woke up because of the blare <fex>of a car horn</fex>.
There was a clatter of running feet <fex>in the street outside</fex>.
He woke up because of the cries <fex>of the crows outside</fex>.
The hiss of snakes <fex>outside the tent</fex> was a constant source of worry.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Why Don't You Play in Hell
